programme.desc: Jason Stillwell um f de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Aps seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrar problemas.

programme.title: Assassino Virtual, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma simulao de realidade virtual criada com as personalidades de vrios serial killers consegue escapar para o mundo real, um ex-policial tem a misso de deter seu reinado de terror.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Davi, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: De um simples pastor a um poderoso rei, Davi, com muita coragem e f, comanda o reino de Israel por muitos anos e deixa seu nome na Histria.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f, uma segunda chance surge para tocar o corao durante a temporada de festas.

programme.title: Restaurados, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Enquanto trs pais lutam para salvar suas famlias, suas vidas se entrelaam em uma jornada improvvel por todo o mundo, onde eles aprendem o poder de cura do perdo e da reconciliao.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: A Fora de um Sonho, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Luz Garcia uma estudante do ensino mdio de uma pequena cidade do Texas, que sonha com um futuro diferente da maioria dos habitantes de sua cidade.

programme.title: Perdidos em Silver Canyon, (1989, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Enquanto esto de frias com a famlia, Joe e Vanessa se separam dos pais e se acham encalhados numa cidade deserta e assombrada. Confiante que Deus iria enviar algum para os salvar, as crianas decidem explorar os ambientes misteriosos

programme.title: 1914 A Primeira Guerra, (2014, War Drama)
programme.desc: medida que o sol do vero de 1914 aquece a Europa continental, a Primeira Guerra Mundial desaba sobre a pennsula fraturada. Vivendo em Paris, o holands Arthur Knaap anseia por servir, proteger e defender a sua amada nao.

programme.title: Torturado por Cristo, (2021, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Uma releitura cinematogrfica do testemunho do fundador de 'A Voz dos Mrtires', Pastor Richard Wurmbrand, conforme escrito em seu best-seller internacional "Torturado por Cristo".

programme.title: Ao Fim da Trilha, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: Sem Perdo, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Red Stone: Caada Mortal, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Um adolescente testemunha o assassinato de seu irmo mais velho nas mos de um senhor do crime local. Quando ele encontra uma pedra valiosa que seu irmo havia escondido, ele percebe que um preo logo estar em sua cabea.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Daniels no demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: O Golpe, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A histria de como um grupo de pequenos criminosos tentou dar o maior golpe na histria dos Estados Unidos em 1975: roubar milhes de um banco no menor estado da federao, Rhode Island.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Sem Perdo, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos

programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Alvo Revelado
programme.desc: Quebrando o campo de fora com seu recente jutsu com os sapos, naruto e a unidade de apoio chega ao local da batalha.

programme.desc: Dentro de uma nvoa pesada, os ninjas da folha tentam achar o naruto. A equipe aumenta a guarda quando fica sabendo que a nvoa que cerca o lago causa iluses.

programme.desc: Naruto entra na nvoa para procurar yukimaru. Guren fica alerta para proteger yukimaru, cuja situao atual o impede de se mexer.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reagrupando!

programme.desc: Para proteger guren da raivosa trs caudas, yukimaru usa poderes alm de seus limites. Comovida pela gesto dele, guren lamenta pelo seu pecado no passado de ter matado a me de yukimaru

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estranhos Companheiros

programme.title: The masked ninja and Naruto fall into the depths of the Valley. While tending to Naruto's wounds, the masked ninja tells him the reason for stealing the star.

programme.title: Natsuhi's body is reacting to the effects of the star. She wields the star and desperately confronts Akahoshi, but Sumaru is taken as hostage
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sumaru senses his mother's death and Naruto is unable to stop an angry Sumaru from running off. To save Sumaru, Hokuto and Mizura stake their lives to reveal the truth behind the star training.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru is injured by a rival shinobi from another nation. The shinobi used a battle skill that spreads bacteria throughout the opponent's body, infecting the victim's mental faculties. This causes Akamaru to go into uncontrollable rampage!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funeral, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testament!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While questioning Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Flight, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Airline pilot Whip Whitaker miraculously lands his plane after a mid-air catastrophe but questions arise as to who or what was really at fault.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Juice, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Q. Raheem. Bishop. Steel. They're four Harlem friends who spend their days hanging out and looking for a way to get the power and respect they call Juice. Q hopes to earn respect by becoming a scratch 'n' mix DJ.

programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Laws Sword Technique!

programme.title: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, shes perfect for Luffys new crew except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggys pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggys pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp who has a connection to Luffys past.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kayas fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!

programme.title: Usopp spreads the word of Kuros evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopps village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoros missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopps friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merrys been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the actions not dead in the water Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Kriegs pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things arent looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponents weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Em sua jornada, Inuyasha e Agome encontram Shippo, um jovem youkai raposa que rouba um pedao da Jia para vingar seu pai assassinado.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E9

programme.title: Inuyasha duela com Hiten enquanto Shippo tenta usar sua magia para resgatar Agome de Manten, mas os Irmos Relmpago no sero derrotados to facilmente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E10

programme.title: Quando Agome retorna ao presente, o poder da Jia de Quatro Almas incita uma antiga mscara de noh para atacar seu av.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E11

programme.title: Inuyasha v um youkai chamado Tatarimokke que guia benevolentemente os espritos das crianas, enquanto Agome encontra o esprito de uma garota chamada Mayu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E12

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e Agome resgatam uma garota chamada Nazuna, eles passam a noite juntos em um santurio e aprendem mais sobre a transformao de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E13

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros encontram a Feiticeira Urasue, que rouba o tmulo de Kikyo, a sacerdotisa que selou Inuyasha. Ele est determinado a impedi-l.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E14

programme.title: Para trazer Kikyo de volta vida, Urasue sequestra Agome. Quando Kikyo revivida, ela imediatamente tenta matar Inuyasha com raiva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E15

programme.title: Mirok, um jovem monge mulherengo, coleciona fragmentos da Jia de Quatro Almas. Quando ele rouba a de Agome, Inuyasha o segue para recuper-los.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E16

programme.title: Um artista chamado Kotatsu sonha em controlar um exrcito de youkais, alimentado por um fragmento da Jia de Quatro Almas. Cabe a Inuyasha e os outros par-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E17

programme.title: Narak d a Sesshomaru um brao humano com um fragmento de Jia embutido, para que Sesshomaru possa tentar recuperar a posse de Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E18

programme.title: Agome ferida durante a luta de Inuyasha com Sesshomaru, e quando Inuyasha descobre o plano de Narak, ele teme por sua vida.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E19

programme.title: Kaede leva Inuyasha e Mirok para uma caverna nas proximidades e conta sobre o seu passado com Kikyo. Enquanto isso, Agome tenta se reajustar sua vida normal.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E20

programme.title: A luta de Inuyasha com Royakan continua. Agome interrompe seu encontro com Hojo para retornar ao santurio, onde ela sente a presena da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E21

programme.title: Kikyo aparentemente ressuscitou e est vivendo como uma sacerdotisa da aldeia. Um monge errante percebe que nem tudo como parece com ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E22

programme.title: Inuyasha procura por Kikyo, mas Agome a encontra primeiro. Kikyo a leva prisioneira e no escuta suas tentativas de explicar o que realmente aconteceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E23

programme.title: A Exterminadora de Youkais Sango convidada para o Castelo de Hitomi junto com seu pai e seu irmo mais novo, Kohaku, deixando sua aldeia indefesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E24

programme.title: Acreditando que ele seja seu inimigo, Sango procura Inuyasha em uma busca equivocada de vingana planejada por Narak, que quer Inuyasha morto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E25

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e seus amigos param para enterrar os mortos, Sango revela a histria secreta das origens da Jia: a prpria alma da sacerdotisa Midoriko.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E26

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos descobrem uma aldeia que sacrifica crianas ao deus local da gua e conhece um menino chamado Taromaru que precisa de sua ajuda.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E27

programme.title: Depois que o tnel de vento de Mirok atingido em uma luta com um youkai, Mirok retorna ao templo onde ele foi criado por Mushin, mas nem tudo est bem por l.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E1

programme.title: Agome e Sango falam sobre seus respectivos passados, incluindo o irmo mais novo de Sango, Kohaku. Mas Narak tem planos sinistros para com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E2

programme.title: A busca de Laki por um Vearth faz com que um de seus camaradas Shandias acabe ferido por Ohm. A noite chega no Jardim de Cima, e os Chapus de Palha sonham com ouro enquanto danam com lobos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E31

programme.title: A eletrizante deidade de Skypiea, o Deus Enel, d a seus sacerdotes poderes ilimitados em sua caada pelos Chapus de Palha. Usopp tem um plano para recuperar o Merry, mas precisar de Chopper como cobaia!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E32

programme.title: Os Chapus de Palha se separam para buscar o ouro, e Wyper est decidido a fazer a investida final ao Santurio de Deus de Enel!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E33

programme.title: O Deus tirano de Skypiea antecipa seu ataque quando as foras de Shandora so confrontadas pela Provao das Cordas, e Luffy se envolve na batalha de sua vida!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E34

programme.title: Zoro confrontra o guerreiro Shandia Braham para aperfeioar uma nova tcnica de suas espadas em pleno ar.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E35

programme.title: Sanji e Usopp caem diante de Deus, Luffy praticamente incinerado pela Bazuca de Wyper, e Nami e Gan Fall combatem dois clones assassinos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E36

programme.title: Chopper libera a fria de sua Goma do Barulho durante um pegajoso combate com o sacerdote pantanoso do Jardim de Cima! A rena descobrir a fraqueza do inimigo antes que seja tarde demais?
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E37

programme.title: Nami e o Cavaleiro do Cu se unem para obliterar dois valentes bolachudos, e o Deus Enel se vale de sua invencibilidade para atormentar um nobre guerreiro de Shandora!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E38

programme.title: A busca de Robin interrompida por Yama, um dos servos de Enel. A destruio de stios arqueolgicos histricas provoca a fria da pirata!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E39

programme.title: Ohm silencia Chopper com um ataque do qual poucos se recuperariam. Luffy comea a perceber algo estranho na caverna, e quatro temveis guerreiros se preparam para a batalha!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E40

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper e Ohm se renem para um combate mortal nas Runas de Cima. Enquanto isso, Luffy tenta fugir das entranhas de uma serpente venenosa!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E41

programme.title: Zoro e Wyper precisam derrotar os mesmos inimigos, mas precisaro sobreviver ao arame farpado branco da Provao de Ferro!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E42

programme.title: Para finalizar a batalha, Zoro lana mo do poder destrutivo da Fnix dos 108 Desejos Mundanos contra o Sacerdote Ohm! Em outra parte da ilha, Enel exige que Robin a ajude a desvendar mistrios antigos de Shandora.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E43

programme.title: O Deus Enel inicia um ataque mortal para exterminar os seres vivos em Skypiea, tornando as runas de Shandora uma batalha sangrenta onde a sobrevivncia est em jogo.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E44

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro e Robin se unem para atacar Enel. Apesar de sua furiosa investida, os quatro guerreiros so incapazes de deter a deidade do relmpago, at que Wyper usa o poder de uma pedra mstica!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E45

programme.title: O Deus Enel se recupera incrivelmente das feridas que deveriam colocar fim ao seu reinado de terror. Zoro e Wyper unem foras para uma investida final, e Nami deve escolher entre seus companheiros e sua prpria sobrevivncia.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E46

programme.title: Luffy escapa da serpente e, diante do que aconteceu nas runas, s pensa em vingana! O Chapu de Palha avana para confrontar Enel!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E47

programme.title: Enquanto os cidados do cu fogem, Enel conjura Deathpiea! Luffy est determinado a deter o tirano, mas primeiro precisa descobrir como pr as mos em Deus!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E48

programme.title: Um punhado de ouro pode ser a runa de Luffy, Sanji e Usopp formam um time de resgate areo e Nami se prepara para um confronto eletrizante contra o Deus Enel!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E49

programme.title: Usopp e Sanji embarcam a Arca Maxim para salvar Nami, e o pirata mentiroso chega bem a tempo de impedir que a gatuna seja dilacerada por um ataque do Deus Enel! Enquanto isso, onde foi parar o cozinheiro?
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E50

programme.title: Apesar do globo de ouro que o prende, Luffy sobe o p de feijo gigante para acertar as contas com Enel, enquanto o povo da ilha encara a clera de Deus!
